statements: SELECT * FROM analyst_reports
SELECT report_id, stock_symbol FROM analyst_reports WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT stock_symbol, report_text FROM analyst_reports ORDER BY report_id DESC
SELECT report_id, report_text FROM analyst_reports WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL'
SELECT * FROM analyst_reports WHERE sentiment_score < 0
SELECT report_id, stock_symbol, sentiment_score, report_text FROM analyst_reports WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT * FROM analyst_reports WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL'
SELECT stock_symbol, report_id FROM analyst_reports ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT report_text, stock_symbol FROM analyst_reports WHERE report_id < 1000
SELECT * FROM analyst_reports ORDER BY report_id DESC
SELECT * FROM StockReports;
SELECT report_text, report_date FROM StockReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_text, stock_symbol FROM StockReports WHERE stock_symbol='AAPL';
SELECT report_text, report_date, sentiment_label FROM StockReports JOIN SentimentAnalysis ON StockReports.report_id = SentimentAnalysis.report_id;
SELECT report_id, sentiment_score FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, stock_symbol FROM StockReports WHERE report_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE sentiment_label = 'Positive' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT StockReports.report_id, StockReports.report_text, SentimentAnalysis.sentiment_score FROM StockReports INNER JOIN SentimentAnalysis ON StockReports.report_id = SentimentAnalysis.report_id;
SELECT report_id, report_text, sentiment_label FROM StockReports LEFT JOIN SentimentAnalysis ON StockReports.report_id = SentimentAnalysis.report_id;
SELECT MAX(sentiment_score) AS highest_score, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_score FROM SentimentAnalysis;
SELECT * FROM analyst_reports;
SELECT report_text, report_date FROM analyst_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, COUNT(*) FROM analyst_reports GROUP BY stock_symbol;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_scores WHERE overall_sentiment > 0.5;
SELECT stock_symbol, price FROM stock_performance WHERE performance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM analyst_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT report_text, report_date FROM analyst_reports WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT * FROM sentiment_scores WHERE overall_sentiment > 0.5 ORDER BY overall_sentiment DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, price, volume FROM stock_performance WHERE performance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT ar.report_text, ss.overall_sentiment, sp.price FROM analyst_reports ar JOIN sentiment_scores ss ON ar.id = ss.report_id JOIN stock_performance sp ON ar.stock_symbol = sp.stock_symbol WHERE sp.price > 100 ORDER BY sp.price DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_reports;
SELECT report_id, stock_symbol, report_date FROM stock_reports;
SELECT analyst_name, report_text FROM stock_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM stock_reports GROUP BY stock_symbol;
SELECT analyst_name, average_sentiment_score FROM analyst_sentiment ORDER BY average_sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC, report_id ASC
SELECT stock_symbol, report_date, analyst_name FROM stock_reports WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' LIMIT 10
SELECT analyst_name, report_text FROM stock_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY analyst_name ASC
SELECT report_id, sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM sentiment_scores WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 AND sentiment_category = 'Positive'
SELECT stock_symbol, overall_sentiment, total_reports_processed FROM stock_sentiment WHERE total_reports_processed >= 100 ORDER BY total_reports_processed DESC
SELECT * FROM stock_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT report_text FROM stock_reports WHERE report_id = 3
SELECT report_id, report_text FROM stock_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT stock_ticker, report_date FROM stock_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM stock_reports WHERE stock_ticker = 'AAPL'
SELECT * FROM stock_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_text FROM stock_reports WHERE stock_ticker = 'AAPL' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT report_text, stock_ticker FROM stock_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' AND report_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT report_text FROM stock_reports WHERE stock_ticker IN ('AAPL', 'GOOGL', 'MSFT') ORDER BY report_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM stock_reports WHERE report_text LIKE '%positive%' AND report_date < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
